00014 // .NAME vtkMrmlMatrixNode - MRML node to represent transformation matrices.
00015 // .SECTION Description
00016 // The output of a rigid-body registration is a rotation and translation 
00017 // expressed mathematically as a transformation matrix.  These transforms 
00018 // can be inserted into MRML files as Matrix nodes.  Each matrix 
00019 // affects volumes and models that appear below it in the MRML file.  
00020 // Multiple matrices can be concatenated together. 
00021 
00022 #ifndef __vtkMrmlMatrixNode_h
00023 #define __vtkMrmlMatrixNode_h
00024 
00025 //#include <iostream.h>
00026 //#include <fstream.h>
00027 #include "vtkMrmlNode.h"
00028 #include "vtkMatrix4x4.h"
00029 #include "vtkSlicer.h"
00030 
00031 class VTK_SLICER_BASE_EXPORT vtkMrmlMatrixNode : public vtkMrmlNode
00032 {
00033 public:
00034   static vtkMrmlMatrixNode *New();
00035   vtkTypeMacro(vtkMrmlMatrixNode,vtkMrmlNode);
00036   void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00037   
00038   // Description:
00039   // Write the node's attributes to a MRML file in XML format
00040   void Write(ofstream& of, int indent);
00041 
00042   // Description:
00043   // 16 numbers that form a 4x4 matrix. The matrix is multiplied by a 
00044   // point (M*P) to compute the transformed point
00045   void SetMatrix(char *str);
00046   char *GetMatrix();
00047 
00048   // Description:
00049   // Rotate around each axis: x,y, and z in degrees
00050   void Scale(float x, float y, float z) {
00051     this->Transform->Scale(x, y, z);};
00052 
00053   // Description:
00054   // Rotate around each axis: x,y, and z in degrees
00055   void RotateX(float d) {
00056     this->Transform->RotateX(d);};
00057   void RotateY(float d) {
00058     this->Transform->RotateY(d);};
00059   void RotateZ(float d) {
00060     this->Transform->RotateZ(d);};
00061 
00062   // Description:
00063   // Rotate around each axis: x,y, and z in degrees
00064   void Translate(float x, float y, float z) {
00065     this->Transform->Translate(x, y, z);};
00066 
00067   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068   // Utility Functions
00069   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 
00071   // Description:
00072   // Copy the node's attributes to this object
00073   void Copy(vtkMrmlNode *node);
00074 
00075   // Description:
00076   // Get/Set for Matrix
00077   vtkGetObjectMacro(Transform, vtkTransform);
00078   vtkSetObjectMacro(Transform, vtkTransform);
00079 
00080 protected:
00081   vtkMrmlMatrixNode();
00082   ~vtkMrmlMatrixNode();
00083   vtkMrmlMatrixNode(const vtkMrmlMatrixNode&) {};
00084   void operator=(const vtkMrmlMatrixNode&) {};
00085 
00086   vtkTransform *Transform;
00087 };
00088 
00089 #endif
